verbs.description: society pals [V: falling] [ARGM-DIR: out] affects newsom getty families most of the talking these days is being done through lawyers the getty - newsom connection goes back to the days when billy father gordon getty and gavin father retired state appellate judge bill newsom schooled together at saint ignatius the elder newsom has become one of the getty family key advisers friends say that when things started to go south between the two old chums because soon after the wedding vanessa started questioning some of billy and gavin joint financial dealings the rumblings came to a head a few months back when newsom struggling to pay the mortgage on his own marina home temporarily moved into a pacific heights house that he and young getty had been jointly remodeling as a business investment like the fact that the senior getty reportedly offered to buy out his son interest in the pacific heights house so gavin could stay there or the fact that the younger getty once dated newsom girlfriend who just moved here from los angeles to take a job as a deputy in the san francisco district attorney office sources tell us the giants are already getting a number of inquiries from potential investors interested in teaming up with the giants in landing a new basketball or ice hockey franchise for the city newsom getty gordon getty vanessa mae gavin newsom j paul getty trust billy getty
